entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
